title: Womens Dress
title_original: Lace Applique Mother of The Bride Dresses for Wedding Sequin Tulle Lace Crew Neck Wedding Guest Dresses

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #669,940 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #4,775 in Women's Formal Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Formal

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars pretty dress, CS issues
items.body: ordered it customized, and paid extra for express ship- dress was very pretty, fit well, lots of compliments, but still WAY to long, event though I clarified length needed a few times. Thankfully it is a wear once dress for me, so was able to cut off excess, and hem with seam tape on underskirt, and just cut off excess netting. (5 inches worth) Item also shipped later then expected, and arrived later then it should with express shipping. Was a struggle to get the extra express ship cost returned, needed to involve Customer Service. It should not be that hard to get a refund on express shipping, when an item arrives late. Read more
items.author: Redpony

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Party dress
items.body: Nice fabric with delicate embroidery. Loved it. Read more
items.author: Ghulam Jilani

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but have to lace up back
items.body: This dress is a little stiff, but when you get it on it’s fine. The wrinkles fell out from just hanging it up. I don’t like that you have to lace it up the back. You HAVE to have someone help you put it on. I won’t keep it as it’s too hard to put on. It looks nice once it is on so for the money and if you have help putting it on it’s worth it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: I really love this formal dress. This dress was the most beautiful and comfortable. I received so many compliments. Read more
items.author: Marguerite Adela

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dusty Sage, Aqua, Olive Green, Fuchsia, Dusty Pink, Stormy Blue, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Eucalyptus, Peacock, Plum, Blush Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
